Skip to main content 
Welcome to James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi Restaurant

The best Japanese food in Charleston, SC
Order Pickup shopping-basket-smile-1 Check Out Our Popular Dishes 
Gallery
Where We Started 
Our Story

James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Japanese cuisine in Charleston, SC. James Island Fire Grill Hibachi Sushi's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Charleston community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

Featured Dishes

Menu

Appetizer
Tempura Shrimp (4 pcs) $5.95 Tempura Vegetable (8 pcs) $6.95 Gyoza (6 pcs) $6.45 Spring Rolls (2 pcs) $4.25 Egg Roll (2 pcs) $4.25 Cheese Wonton $5.75 Edamame $5.25

Side Orders
Side Order of Vegetables $5.25 Side Chicken $5.75 Side Shrimp $6.55 Side Steak $8.95 Fried Rice $5.00 Steamed Rice $5.00 Shrimp Fried Rice $10.95 Ham Fried Rice $9.95 Chicken Fried Rice $9.95 House Special Fried Rice $12.55 Plain Fried Rice (Sm) $3.45 White Rice (Sm) $3.45 Beef Fried Rice $11.95 
Beverages
Soft Drinks $2.99 Sweet Tea $2.99 View Menu tools-kitchen-serving-dome What our customers say 
Reviews

Consistent good food, quick for carry out and they are very friendly. Always a go-to when we can't be bothered to cook. I really like the texture of the fried rice.
Danielle 
Amazing food! Ordered last week (chicken bowl, shrimp lo mein and telfair roll) it was so good that we ordered some again tonight! Fresh, Fast and very friendly.
Kimberly Mascelli 
Always busy here for a reason. Great food and they work extremely hard to get the orders processed as fast as possible. We appreciate you being here on James Island.
JP 
It’s a great deal to order from here and the food tastes really good. They gave you a really good amount of food for the money. People should try out this place :)
Peter Chen 
Wow, the food here is awesome. The staff was super nice and attentive. Our grilled chicken and steak was better than any other hibachi I’ve been to, just wow!
Casey 
Decided to give it a try, and man was happy we did! The sushi was so fresh and delicious. Everything we ordered was excellent. Our new favorite place on James Island!
Jaime Tropauer
